data:item.name: mcxn947-camera-interface-by-smartdma
data:item.display_title: AN14191: How to Use SmartDMA to Implement Camera Interface in MCXN MCU
data:item.overview: This software accompanies application note [AN14191](https://www.nxp.com.cn/docs/en/application-note/AN14191.pdf).This application note describes the parallel interface for the camera solution in MCXN947 andMCXN236. It includes the introduction of camera interface, features, API routines, and demo.
